description.value:
Lasts 1d10-Toughness Bonus of subject hours. During which time they count as Fatigued, and must also make a -20 Willpower Test to perform any action of their own volition. Psychic Characters reduce their Psy Rating by 4 while under its effects.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: 500 T
